default.title: Pricing and packages
default.intro: Programmes are scoped around the change you are working towards. Fees below cover preparation, session time and written reflections between conversations.

plans.name: Focused series
plans.description: Three 60-minute sessions delivered over six weeks.
highlights: Clarify the outcome you need right now.
Build momentum with practical experiments between sessions.

plans.name: Season of change
highlights: Work through layered transitions with steady accountability.
Blend coaching conversations with light mentoring where useful.
Optional check-ins by voice note between sessions.

plans.name: Ongoing partnership
plans.description: Flexible retainer with one 60-minute session and asynchronous support each month.
highlights: Keep commitments visible after the initial sprint.
Access reviews of key documents or narratives within two business days.
Pause or restart with two weeks’ notice.

notes: Employer sponsorship and invoicing are available where confidentiality agreements are in place.
Payment plans can be set up at no additional cost for self-funded clients.
Reduced-fee places are reserved each quarter for people in between roles.

career-return.intro: Returners often pair coaching with caring and part-time schedules. We build in space for experimentation so your comeback is sustainable.
notes: Session cadence flexes around interview rounds, onboarding or family milestones.
We can partner with your employer or sponsor once confidentiality is agreed.

graduate-start.intro: Graduates usually arrive with rapid change on the horizon. Packages focus on momentum and building helpful routines early on.

plans.name: Launch support
plans.description: Three 50-minute sessions during your first 90 days in role.
highlights: Translate onboarding expectations into manageable experiments.
Practise key conversations before they happen.
Capture wins and learnings to share with stakeholders.

plans.name: Graduate accelerator
plans.description: Five sessions across five months with optional manager touchpoints.
highlights: Strengthen rhythms that protect energy outside of work.
Build confidence with feedback loops tailored to your organisation.
Share progress updates that feel authentic to you.

immigrant-job.intro: International clients often balance job searches with immigration logistics. Together we design support that accounts for those constraints.
notes: We adapt session times across time zones and care responsibilities.
Documentation reviews can cover CVs, cover letters or networking outreach.
Visa-related questions are signposted to trusted legal partners.
